en: Touch the mat with your forehead.

ru: Одну ногу поднимите назад и вверх.
en: Lift one leg upward and back.
Tuck your elbows close to your torso.
Extend one arm straight out fully.
Place it back on the mat.
Lengthen your opposite arm forward.
Return your hand to the mat.
Extend both arms out to the sides.
Simultaneously lift both arms.

ru: Поднятое колено выпрямите и носок натяните на себя.
en: Extend the lifted knee into a straight line and flex the foot, drawing toes toward the torso.
Press your heel back and upwards.
Lower your arms and draw them in toward your body.
Perform push-ups.

ru: Согните вытянутую ногу и противоположной кистью перекрёстно возьмитесь за голень.
en: Bend your extended leg and cross your opposite hand to hold the shin.
Eka Hasta Vyaghrasana.
One Handed Tiger Pose.

ru: Поднятый плечевой сустав подайте вперед и вниз.
en: Move the elevated shoulder joint forward and downward trajectory.
Lift your leg upward.

ru: Таз сместите в сторону поднятой ноги.
en: Shift your hips towards the side of your lifted leg.

ru: Поднятое колено подайте в сторону опорной ноги.
en: move your raised knee toward your standing leg.
A narrow corridor.
Widen the chest.

ru: Пятку поднятой ноги прижмите к ягодице.
en: Press the heel of your raised leg against your buttock.
tuck the toe of your standing.

ru: Выпрямите согнутую ногу и выведите таз вверх и назад.
en: Straighten your bent leg and lift your pelvis upward and backward.

ru: Одну кисть поставьте вперед на коврик.
en: Place one hand forward on the mat.

ru: Вытяните поднятую ногу назад и вверх.
en: Stretch your lifted leg back and up.
Eka Pada Adho Mukha Svanasana.

ru: Собака мордой вниз на одной ноге.
en: One-Legged Downward Facing Dog Pose.
Reach your chest towards your knee.

ru: Пятку опорной стопы потяните к коврику.
en: Pull the heel of your standing foot back toward the mat as you press your toes down.
Push up by bending your elbows.
Lower your elbows to make contact with the mat surface.
Exhale on exertion.

ru: Протяните вперед одно, затем другое колени к кистям.
en: Guide each knee sequentially toward the wrists in a flowing forward extension.
Lower the pelvis between the heels.
